title: Epigollatecatechin gallate alleviates rheumatoid arthritis through PI3K-Akt pathway by inhibiting FLT1.
abstract: Rheumatoid arthritis (RA) is a chronic inflammatory disease. Ershiwuwei Luyue Pill (ELP), a Tibetan medicine prescription, is one of the most commonly used treatments for wind dampness and joint pain. However, its detailed mechanism of action remains unclear.
